Quotes.Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quotes.Quote: Don't believe everything you read on the internet.

Quotes.Author: Italian Proverb
Quotes.Quote: After the game, the king and the pawn go into the same box.

Quotes.Author: Sigmund Freud
Quotes.Quote: Dreams are often most profound when they seem the most crazy.

Quotes.Author: T.S Eliot
Quotes.Quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.

Quotes.Author: Nelson Mandela
Quotes.Quote: There is no passion to be found playing small ― in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.

Quotes.Author: Walt Whitman
Quotes.Quote: Do I contradict myself? Very well, then, I contradict myself; I am large ― I contain multitudes.

Quotes.Author: Oscar Wilde
Quotes.Quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.

Quotes.Author: Gertrude Stein
Quotes.Quote: Everybody knows if you are too careful you are so occupied in being careful that you are sure to stumble over something.

Quotes.Author: Boris Pasternak
Quotes.Quote: Man is born to live, not to prepare for life.

Quotes.Author: Sigmund Freud
Quotes.Quote: Most people do not really want freedom, because freedom involves responsibility, and most people are frightened of responsibility.

Quotes.Author: Siddhārtha Gautama Buddha
Quotes.Quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought. The mind is everything. What we think, we become.

Quotes.Author: Allen Ginsberg
Quotes.Quote: Follow your inner moonlight; don’t hide the madness.

Quotes.Author: Golda Meir
Quotes.Quote: Those who do not know how to weep with their whole heart don’t know how to laugh either.

Quotes.Author: Carl Sagan
Quotes.Quote: Science is not only compatible with spirituality; it is a profound source of spirituality.

Quotes.Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quotes.Quote: Everything that we see is a shadow cast by that which we do not see.

Quotes.Author: Emily Dickinson
Quotes.Quote: The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience.

Quotes.Author: Pablo Picasso
Quotes.Quote: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.

Quotes.Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quotes.Quote: Earth’s crammed with heaven… But only he who sees, takes off his shoes.

Quotes.Author: Ezra Pound
Quotes.Quote: A slave is one who waits for someone to come and free him.

Quotes.Author: Zora Neale Hurston
Quotes.Quote: Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.

Quotes.Author: Mark Twain
Quotes.Quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.

Quotes.Author: C.G. Jung
Quotes.Quote: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves.

Quotes.Author: Charles Baudelaire
Quotes.Quote: Genius is nothing more nor less than childhood recaptured at will.

Quotes.Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quotes.Quote: You must have chaos within you to give birth to a dancing star.

Quotes.Author: Jack Canfield
Quotes.Quote: Don’t worry about failures, worry about the chances you miss when you don’t even try.

Quotes.Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quotes.Quote: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

Quotes.Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quotes.Quote: Don’t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds you plant.

Quotes.Author: Talmud
Quotes.Quote: We don’t see things the way they are. We see them the way we are.

Quotes.Author: Marcel Pagnol
Quotes.Quote: The reason people find it so hard to be happy is that they always see the past better than it was, the present worse than it is, and the future less resolved than it will be.

Quotes.Author: Lao Tzu
Quotes.Quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step

Quotes.Author: Howard Thurman
Quotes.Quote: Don’t ask what the world needs. Ask what makes you come alive and go do it. Because what the world needs is more people who have come alive.

Quotes.Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quotes.Quote: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make, the better.

Quotes.Author: Will Rogers
Quotes.Quote: Too many people spend money they haven’t earned, to buy things they don’t want, to impress people they don’t like.

Quotes.Author: Wayne Gretzky
Quotes.Quote: I skate to where the puck is going to be, not where it has been.

Quotes.Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quotes.Quote: The price of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.

Quotes.Author: Shing Xiong
Quotes.Quote: In the end, it’s not going to matter how many breaths you took, but how many moments took your breath away.
